TopicTitle: Teaching My Girlfriend KSP: To the Mun and Back!

Articles.Content:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w4PMaf69-xI&feature=youtu.be



200 Subscriber Special!

I finally convinced my girlfriend to play KSP! Watch as I guide her into LKO, burn for the Mun, land near the Armstrong Memorial, jet pack around, get back into orbit, head for Kerbin, and splash down!
